text:
Accepting an offer outside academia as a research economist (BEA). :slightly_smiling_face: #PermanentJob
Do we have a community in the US Fed statistical system for using Julia at the federal government and such?

elements.text: Accepting an offer outside academia as a research economist (BEA).

#PermanentJob
Do we have a community in the US Fed statistical system for using Julia at the federal government and such?

text: I know Matt Helm who's active on Discourse works with the Census, I believe. I work for the government of California.

elements.text: I know Matt Helm who's active on Discourse works with the Census, I believe. I work for the government of California.

text: I think each year The Federal Reserve Bank of New York presents a talk or two at JuliaCon on "this is the R model that used to take 3 days to run and now runs in 2 minutes in Julia"

elements.text: I think each year The Federal Reserve Bank of New York presents a talk or two at JuliaCon on "this is the R model that used to take 3 days to run and now runs in 2 minutes in Julia"

text:
wow great offer! congrats!

Would be great to see more Fed people here. Maybe you can bring them in!

elements.text:
wow great offer! congrats!

Would be great to see more Fed people here. Maybe you can bring them in!

text: I might find myself in the tech advisory committee to help give a Julia spark... I think it’s internal to BEA/Census but hopefully it helps with wider adoption through the statistical system. I interviewed with a few FFRDC and Julia came up during those convs.

elements.text: I might find myself in the tech advisory committee to help give a Julia spark... I think it’s internal to BEA/Census but hopefully it helps with wider adoption through the statistical system. I interviewed with a few FFRDC and Julia came up during those convs.

text: If you can snag some funding for econometrics.jl too...

elements.text: If you can snag some funding for econometrics.jl too...

text: Laurent Berge is crushing it with `fixest` in R! it's hard to keep up!

elements.text: Laurent Berge is crushing it with
in R! it's hard to keep up!

text: I was also considering an assistant professor at the School of Data Science (UVA) and already had plans for getting students to contribute to the package and ecosystem in general. At least I got RC to pay good attention and support to Julia in our HPC these last two years.

elements.text: I was also considering an assistant professor at the School of Data Science (UVA) and already had plans for getting students to contribute to the package and ecosystem in general. At least I got RC to pay good attention and support to Julia in our HPC these last two years.

text: That's exciting progress! I have hopes of doing something with BU's new data science department, hopefully these new programs can get funding that goes to economists and not just ML people

elements.text: That's exciting progress! I have hopes of doing something with BU's new data science department, hopefully these new programs can get funding that goes to economists and not just ML people

text: congrats! I think I applied for that job :smile:

elements.text: congrats! I think I applied for that job

text: Thanks and grats on the VT position as well!

elements.text: Thanks and grats on the VT position as well!
